# Third-party audio vendors

This directory contains binary dependencies bundled with SARA:

- `windows/bass.dll` – BASS audio engine (© Un4seen Developments Ltd.). See
  `bass.txt` for licensing terms.
- `windows/bs1770gain/` – bs1770gain 0.7.0 CLI (`bs1770gain.exe`) with the
  accompanying `bs1770gain-tools` runtime DLLs and license. Original sources:
  https://sourceforge.net/projects/bs1770gain/ (GPL-2.0).
